name: Zamaana Deewana

name: The Notorious Landlady
summary_text: An American junior diplomat in London rents a house from, and falls in love with, a woman suspected of murder.

name: Tarzan and the Mermaids
summary_text: To escape from an arranged marriage to Aquatania's pagan god, a desperate maiden ends up in Tarzan's fishing net. But soon, he, too, finds himself before a well-planned conspiracy. Can Tarzan save the mermaid from the barbaric idol's will?

name: Yok Artik 2
summary_text: A Turkish barber tells stories which are almost unbelievable.

name: Jacky in the Kingdom of Women
summary_text: In the Kingdom of Bubunne, women are in power while men wear veils and do domestic tasks. Jacky, a lovely young man who dreams of marrying the 'Colonelle' has to struggle like a Cinderella to realize his dreams.

name: I Love You Too
summary_text: A commitment-phobe and a New Ager buddy-up to win over the women of their respective dreams.

name: La Cage aux Folles II
summary_text: Nightclub owner Renato and his transvestite companion/lover Albin becoming involved with the local cops and foreign spies when Albin unwittingly gets his hands on a roll of stolen microfilm...                See full summary »

name: The Terrorists
summary_text: In a Scandinavian country, national security chief Colonel Tahlvik is tasked to rescue the passengers of a hijacked British airliner while the British Ambassador is being held hostage at his residence by another terrorist team.

name: Yaadon Ki Baaraat
summary_text: Three brothers are separated after their parents' murder. Years later, their only hope of avenging their parents and reuniting as a family lies in the song they learned as children.

name: Storm Over Asia
summary_text: After a run-in with the law, a Mongolian man becomes a fugitive and joins the Russian Civil War.

name: Patients
summary_text: Patients is the story of a rebirth, a chaotic journey of victories and defeats, tears and bursts of laughter, but above all encounters: we do not heal alone.

name: Heavenly Sword
summary_text: A power-hungry ruler known as King Bohan seeks to obtain the long-protected "Heavenly Sword" in order to use its devastating power for evil. Why doesn't anyone ever use immensely powerful swords for good anymore?

name: Pars: Kiraz operasyonu
summary_text: A story describing Turkish narcotic police team named "Pars" who are trailing the traffic through Afghanistan, Turkey, Europe and USA.

name: Possible Worlds
summary_text: A man lives in parallel worlds, falling in love with the same woman, while the police hunt down a serial killer who steals brains.

name: Kein Pardon

name: Mais où est donc passée la 7ème compagnie
summary_text: 1940: During the chaotic running fights of the French army the 7th company disappears - nobody knows they've been taken captive. Only their scouting patrol, three witty but lazy guys, can ...                See full summary »

name: Maayavan
summary_text: A police officer is on a mission to nab a criminal,who does murder in a same mysteric pattern.

name: Christmas Incorporated
summary_text: Riley lands herself a new job via a case of mistaken identity, and her first assignment is to accompany her new boss on a trip to save a failing toy factory.

name: Free Fall
summary_text: An employee, working for Gault Capital in L.A, gets targeted by a ruthless assassin and locked in the elevator after she uncovers a chilling secret.

name: Ethir Neechal
summary_text: A young man opts to run a marathon to prove himself.

name: Fe Mahatet masr
summary_text: A young girl seeks help in a stranger to convince her strict father she got married in secret so as not to be forced into and arranged marriage

name: The Last Keepers
summary_text: When the teenage daughter of a reclusive family of artists falls in love with an unusual boy at school, she awakens mysterious powers and discovers ancient family secrets that will change her life forever.

name: The Bunker
summary_text: Dramatization depicting the events surrounding Adolf Hitler's (Sir Anthony Hopkins') last weeks in and around his underground bunker in Berlin before and during the battle for the city.

name: Rituals
summary_text: Five doctors on a wilderness outing are stalked by disfigured, crazed killers.

name: Infra-Man
summary_text: Princess Dragon Mom and her mutant army have arisen, and only Inframan can stop them!

name: Cinderella Liberty
summary_text: A lonely Navy sailor falls in love with a hooker and becomes a surrogate father figure for her son during an extended liberty, due to his service records being lost.

name: Ah Güzel Istanbul
summary_text: Black comedy about a girl who runs away from her rural village to Istanbul to become and actress and an old drunkard street photographer.

name: Kiss Them for Me
summary_text: In 1944, three Navy pilots stationed in Hawaii and a P.R. officer go on a 4-day leave to San Francisco where they party with a good crowd in the executive suite of a busy hotel.

name: Peter Ibbetson
summary_text: A Victorian-era architect, commissioned by the Duke of Towers to design his stables, falls in love with the Duchess.

name: Boo-dang-geo-rae
summary_text: When the most probable serial killer suspect dies and the case looks like it's reached a dead end, police brass decide to create a killer - and anyone will do.

name: Hello
summary_text: Call-center workers receive a phone call from God.

name: The Sun Also Rises

name: Palais royal!
summary_text: A comedy set in the world of European royalty.

name: An Early Frost
summary_text: A young lawyer hasn't told his parents about his homosexuality. Now he must tell them--at a time when the diagnosis was still a death sentence--that he has AIDS.

name: WEAPONiZED
summary_text: A damaged homicide detective (Johnny Messner) must prevent a grieving father from unleashing a "robotic virus" that he believes will destroy the terrorist cell that murdered his son, but at an unimaginable cost.

name: Broken Vows
summary_text: A charming yet troubled man spirals into a rage after being rejected by the woman he initially seduced.

name: Mot naturen
summary_text: A journey inside Martin's head. He's on a weekend mountain trip, and we get to know his thoughts. Unsensored, essential, existential and silly about feelings and fantasies. A recognizable film about being human, and how we tick and think.

name: Hoa-cha
summary_text: A man searches for his fiancée who vanished without a trace just before their wedding ceremony, only to discover the shocking identity of her.

name: The Secret Diaries of Miss Anne Lister
summary_text: A look at the life of 19th century Yorkshire landowner Anne Lister (1791-1840), who lived openly as a lesbian and kept diaries chronicling the details of her daily life.

name: The World's Greatest Lover
summary_text: A neurotic baker travels to Hollywood to attend a talent search for an actor to rival the great Valentino. Although not an actor, through blind luck he succeeds, to a certain degree.

name: Susana
summary_text: An unstable young woman escapes from a reformatory for very, very wayward girls and deceptively finds shelter in the kind home of a frighteningly nice and decent family. Little by little, ...                See full summary »

name: Red Christmas
summary_text: A mother must protect her family on Christmas Day from a demented stranger who is hell-bent on tearing them apart.

name: Dhammu
summary_text: An orphan gets adopted by a rich and powerful family looking for a heir. But the family has a dark violent past due to dispute with a rival family. What will he do when the fate of his village depends on him?

name: Rommel
summary_text: The story of the final seven months in the life of German Field Marshal Erwin Rommel.

name: Nightmare Beach
summary_text: After the execution of a motorcycle gang leader convicted of murder, a helmeted biker goes on a killing spree during spring break in Florida.

summary_text: In medieval Persia, during the rule of Caliph Harun-Al-Rashid, Sinbad the Sailor boasts about his latest adventures to his friends.

name: Dames
summary_text: A multimillionaire decides to boycott "filthy" forms of entertainment such as Broadway shows.

name: Rifkin's Festival
summary_text: A married American couple go to the San Sebastian Festival and get caught up in the magic of the event, the beauty and charm of the city and the fantasy of movies.
A closeted young man goes home for the holidays and struggles to reveal his dire circumstances to his conservative family.

name: The Party's Just Beginning
summary_text: When her best friend takes his own life, Liusaidh has to deal with stresses of such a situation.

name: Bey Yaar
summary_text: In the desperation to earn quick money, two best friends put their moral values at stake and end up losing their pride and dignity. They then choose a wrong path to set things right and snatch back what was rightfully theirs.

name: Baba
summary_text: Baba (Rajini) an atheist, by a twist of fate, acquires magical powers from a divine source and takes on crooked politicians.

name: Call of the Wild
summary_text: During the Klondike Gold Rush, a traveler purchases a dog to lead the way toward the treasure, but reconsiders his journey when he finds a jilted married woman.

name: Victor/Victoria
summary_text: A woman pretending to be a man impersonating a woman.

name: Rent-a-Kid
summary_text: Harry Habert, owner of a rent office has an original idea: To rent babies from a nearby orphanage to the local families. He rents the Ward brothers to his first customers.

name: If It's Tuesday, This Must Be Belgium
summary_text: The humorous adventures of a group of American tourists taking an eighteen-day guided bus tour of nine European countries.

name: The Gypsy Moths
summary_text: Three skydivers and their travelling thrill show barnstorm through a small midwestern town one Fourth of July weekend.

name: A Date for Mad Mary
summary_text: A woman newly released from prison seeks a date to bring to her best friend's wedding.

name: Body
summary_text: A night out turns deadly when three girls break into a seemingly empty mansion.

name: Ramayya Vastavayya
summary_text: Nandu a happy go lucky boy falls in love with Akarsha (Samantha) only to avenge his fiance's death.

summary_text: After a botched bank job, a gang takes hostage a Japanese girl on the run from an arranged marriage, and escapes. Their wheel man saves the girl from them and the two go on the run with cops, the gang and her psycho husband on their tail.

summary_text: A young man gains significant political influence as the leader of a counterculture rock band with his rallying cry of voting rights for teenagers.

summary_text: A quick witted young man from the streets of South Central must rush a lily-white USC fraternity to recover a stash of stolen money.

name: Operator
summary_text: Joe, a programmer and obsessive self-quantifier, and Emily, a budding comedy performer, are happily married until they decide to use one another in their work.

summary_text: After a conversation with a man playing Santa Claus during her office Christmas party, a woman wakes up to find herself married to her college sweetheart and two kids and questions her life choices.

summary_text: A big city advertising executive inherits her great-aunt's inn and heads to the small Alaskan town where it's located to get it ready for sale.

summary_text: A radio star experiences the worst night of his life when stalkers assault the radio station where he's working.
